item.title: Book Review: The Art of Living by Thich Nhat Hanh
item.description: After finishing the book “Siddhartha” by Hermann Hesse, I felt a need to explore Buddhism in more detail. People often say that the core teachings of Buddha offer a simple philosophy, which consists of only a few precepts and essential concepts. I figured that it wouldn’t hurt to spend some time understanding the core principles of Buddhism, one of the most influential religions and lifestyle philosophies. So, I started searching for resources to learn more about it.
